name: Vanishree Rao
description: I am the founder of Fermah, a universal proof generation layer, backed by A16Z and Lemniscap. We are coming out to stealth in August timeframe. Previously, I led cryptography for Mina. I did my phd in cryptography at UCLA with Amit Sahai. Also here is my publication list: https://dblp.org/pid/22/9358.html
